dataList.content: Affınıza sığınırım! Bir sualim var!
Diye Don Quixote aniden elini kaldırdı .
Buyur.
Filvaki, kural numara 1'i hatim ettim! kural numara 2, peki?
Hah, really… Why are you so eager to learn that?
Vergilius Ryōshū'ya ,sigarasını yeni yakmıştı, nazar ettiksen sonra...
Kural numara 2
Otobüsü küllük olarak kullanmayın, Charon üzülüyor.
…Hah.
Sükunet, gene Otobüse çökmüştü.
Bir saniye, Bu kadar sessiz olmamalı. Motorun sesi nerde?
Charon, neden hızlanmıyorsun?
Yakıtsızlık. Mephi aç.
Güzel. We could use something to lift the mood.
Are we dropping by a gas station?
The idea of Vergilius casually plugging a fuel nozzle into the bus like an average driver felt alien.
A car needs fuel to run.
Charon, try flashing the headlights a bit. Like stage lights.
Mhm, it’s dance timey.
Wait, if we do that, we’re effectively asking to be attacked.
That appears to be the intent.
…Sorry?
I could hear someone slam the bus outside.

dataList.title: District 4 Backstreets
dataList.content: Oi! Leave all ya stuff behind and get off! Y’got 30 seconds! Ten! Nine!

dataList.title: District 4 Backstreets
dataList.content: Ey, you skipped twenty of ‘em.

dataList.title: District 4 Backstreets
dataList.content: Er… Uhh… Well say your prayers for the other 20!
Sigh, why am I surrounded by dullards left and right.
…What’d you just say?
How cowardly of them to ambush us! They must be villains without a shadow of a doubt!
Alright, everyone off.
And one more thing: we want them near death, not dead. Got it?
